headline: Gigapower Appoints Donna Rattley Washington as Head of Strategy
summary: DALLAS, July 01, 2025--Gigapower, a joint venture between AT&T and a fund managed by Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP), a part of BlackRock with the goal of expanding high-speed, reliable fiber internet through open-access networks, has appointed Donna Rattley Washington to the position of Head of Strategy.

raw.headline: Gigapower Appoints Donna Rattley Washington as Head of Strategy
raw.summary: DALLAS, July 01, 2025--Gigapower, a joint venture between AT&T and a fund managed by Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP), a part of BlackRock with the goal of expanding high-speed, reliable fiber internet through open-access networks, has appointed Donna Rattley Washington to the position of Head of Strategy.

headline: MCE Systems and AT&T Land Gold Prize in 2025 U.S. Customer Experience Awards for "Best Digital CX"
summary: DALLAS, July 01, 2025--MCE Systems, the leader in digital-first Device Lifecycle Management (dDLM) solutions, officially announces that it has received the U.S. Customer Experience Awards (USCXA) highest accolade for "Best Digital CX or Transformation" in collaboration with AT&T. This gold award recognizes the implementation of AT&T’s Device Help app and its impact on customer mobile device experience and customer support operations.

raw.headline: MCE Systems and AT&T Land Gold Prize in 2025 U.S. Customer Experience Awards for "Best Digital CX"

This gold award recognizes the implementation of AT&T’s Device Help app and its impact on customer mobile device experience and customer support operations.

headline: ASTS Chooses Luxembourg as SatCo Headquarters: More Focus on Europe?
summary: ASTS names Luxembourg as SatCo HQ, aiming to power Europe's mobile networks with direct-to-device satellite tech.

headline: AT&T Outpaces Industry in 6 Months: Reason to Buy the Stock?
summary: T rises 26.7% in a year, fueled by fiber growth and improved business services, outpacing the broader tech sector.
